note_text: This Pt speak both English and French.
Le patient parle anglais et français.

Kan dit pasiënt Engels en only, Patient Name: NameDate of Birth: DATE 
Date of Service: 02/13
Subjective:
Patient presents with a 3-day history of productive cough, reporting greenish sputum, mild dyspnea, and intermittent fever peaking at 101°F. Denies chest pain, hemoptysis, or recent travel. Past medical history significant for hypertension, managed with lisinopril. 
Objective:
- Vital Signs: BP 130/85 mmHg, HR 88 bpm, RR 18 breaths/min, Temp 100.8°F, SpO₂ 95% on room air.
- General: Alert and oriented; no acute distress.
- Respiratory: Coarse crackles noted in the right lower lobe; no wheezes.
- Cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm; no murmurs..
Here is a very long sample note that is in English. It is very long and has a lot of text. It is a very long note. However, no other language mentioned in this note\nOK
No day
Patient reports sore throat, runny nose, and fever since yesterday.
Tiene dolor de cabeza y tos seca desde anoche.
Patient complains of chills, body aches, and fatigue.
환자가 기침과 코막힘, 미열을 호소합니다.
Reports severe congestion, sneezing, and watery eyes.
Paciente dice que tiene escalofríos y dolor de garganta.
Patient mentions cough with yellow phlegm and mild headache.
患者诉说喉咙痛、流鼻涕和轻微发烧。
Says throat is scratchy and feels very tired.
Пациент жалуется на кашель, насморк и температуру.
Complains of sore throat, congestion, and muscle aches.
مریض کھانسی اور گلے میں خراش کی شکایت کر رہا ہے۔
Patient reports fever, body aches, and dry cough.
Pasyente ay may ubo, sipon, at pananakit ng katawan.
Reports nasal congestion and headache with chills.
Paciente refiere dolor corporal y fiebre baja.
Patient says: "Head feels heavy, coughing a lot."
مرضي شكايت مي كرتا هے كه اسه بخار اور سردي لاغ رهی هے۔
Says cough worsens at night with sore throat.
患者表示晚上咳嗽加重并伴有喉咙痛
